title: Managing Your Money - A U.S. Recession is Looming. Now What?
description: Join Lauren Foster, senior writer at Barron’s, and Joseph Davis, Vanguard’s global chief economist and the global head of the firm's investment strategy group, to discuss the outlook for the U.S. economy and how investors should best position their portfolios for the bumpy road that lies ahead.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
